title: Riot will you have any BLACK FRIDAY Deals??
body: Yeah basically what the description said

replies.body:
Damn, that would be pretty dang cool. Instead of camping out in the cold waiting for a great deal on some vidyagaemz you could sit in your own toasty home and nab some great deals on dope skins! I'm not on the store team, so I have absolutely no idea if this could ever be a thing, but I think it's a pretty neat idea.

If you feel strongly about this, I encourage you to draft up an idea of how this could work and post it to the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where a member from the store team can potentially see it. Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^

So I hope that what the guy below says is untrue that Tencent only cares about the money (though I would put it past them), but you can't forward this to somebody that works with the store? That is almost a must for a company like you guys to maintain good relations with the community.

it will be pretty cool if that happen's i mean everyone has black Friday store's offline and online even freaking dota has but league of legends never had a single one 

i would create a draft but do you guys even listen???

i don't want to waste my time explaining and writing about something that potentially its never going to happen 

After all Tencent want's to extract maximum cashflow out of league and they made it to corporate that's why even the icons and wards are RP sales instead of IP 

Even if you guys agreed on Black Friday sales i don't think Tencent will 

After all there are thousands of people working already at Riot 

why would anyone care about my opinion??

I know for sure tencent only cares about this ====> http://i.imgur.com/9lnyCwv.png and how to increase it

Sooo.. i don't think its gonna ever happen

It's all about maximum cashflow now with Riot and everything became corporate 

Skins after skins bundle's after bundle's nerf's on champions after selling a high ticket skin ( Ashe example ) and so on i know what Tencent its trying to do 

Also i posted many threats about A Diana skin that i would really like to be made and get an opinion from a Riot Lead Designer but that never happen and no one paid attention to it from Riot 

Soo why bother now?? 

In my eye's Riot doesn't even care about the playerbase opinion you guy's just make change's and you roll out stuff and we just have to accept them and move on with them 

That what i think

So this is how i suppose this would work. You have everything a certain percent off according to popularity
 For Example: If WorldBreaker Nasus is very popular, you could have like 10% off because it is already a pretty low price but if something like DJ Sona is very unpopular, you could have like 30-40% off This would result in an increase in sales which means that Riot will make up for the money they made... Everyone wins
Please i hope that riot does
